scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd packages/contracts && yarn install
scripts.build:contracts: cd packages/contracts && forge build && npm run copy:abis
scripts.copy:abis: mkdir -p packages/sdk/abi && cp -r packages/contracts/out/**/*.json packages/sdk/abi/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:sdk && npm run build:web
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter web clean && pnpm --filter sdk clean && cd packages/contracts && forge clean
scripts.deploy:testnet: cd packages/contracts && forge script script/Deploy.s.sol --rpc-url story_testnet --broadcast
